text: The men's pole vault event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 21 and 22 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Aleksey Khanafin ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Aleksandr Korchmyd ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Rocky Danners ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
